website_summaries.verdict: Somewhat basic with a few exceptional features, but sound quality isn't one of them.
pros: Compact design with swivel and flip screen
Built-in anti-shock feature holds up to wear and tear
cons: Turning up volume to highest setting doesn't help much

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a year now. We drive from Georgia to Rhode Island monthly for adoption events. This player is always on my packing must have list. Easy to use. Good battery life. Good sound and visual quality.
customer_reviews.author: Angela m McElroym

customer_reviews.title: Awesome DVD player!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome DVD player! It's light in weight and a pretty purple color. The picture is great quality and it is easy to use. My daughter loves it. I got it for her for Christmas for our drive to Florida at the end of March! I definitely recommend it to others!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality pieces
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dvd a year ago. It worked great. We used it under 50 times and then this last trip we were on the airplane and it wouldn't read discs anymore. It hadn't been dropped or mishandled. Very disappointed. We also spent a whole 6 hour flight with 2 toddlers and no dvd player. Update: the company contacted us and the lense that reads discs needed to be cleaned. It worked great after this. Update 5/3: However, I'm a couple months past that review and the hinge on the plastic piece that covers the dvd has broken. So it will not stay in place and not read discs.
customer_reviews.author: ALT

customer_reviews.title: Great DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little portable DVD player. So far so good! Has wall charger and car charger, along with a remote and a miniature game remote. Can't wait to use it on our road trip next week. 18 hour car ride with a 1.5 year old so we need some extra entertainment and this was the answer!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made - not operable
customer_reviews.text: This product was quite disappointing. I read the reviews and wonder how in the world it could be the same product. It is made of plastic throughout. The joystick looked and felt like it should have been a movie prop and not something that was actually suppose to operate. In fact, it didn't. The buttons on the device itself and the joystick were inoperable. My grandson was quite disappointed. The game quality seemed like it was pirated. Shame on Amazon for making this an Amazon Choice purchase. It is already packed up to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: CobieK

customer_reviews.title: Promises free item in exchange for positive review
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed and found these promotional cards inside. Explains why there are so many positive reviews. You can get a free car headrest item by writing a positive “porudct” review. Also, the instructions card says to press the orange open button, however the button is silver on all models. Could be a translation issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Sea

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 2 1/2 year our grandson to watch videos at his little table. Works great and is the perfect size for him. Will be trying it in the car on the next road trip with him.
customer_reviews.author: Debra D.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars? No way.
customer_reviews.text: If your wondering why the reviews are so good, it's probably due to the free headrest mount offered for a 5 star rating. This portable DVD player is 2 stars at best. In less than a week of use it no longer sits upright and needs to be used flat. When using flat of any pressure is put on the screen the buttons that lay behind are pressed and skip or shut off the movie. Using it in the mount is pretty much the only upside of the purchase. It works, but is poor quality and poorly designed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product ... Good picture etc... Bought a blue tooth speaker from here for $ 20 something & the sound is so much better now... Easy ACC 4.0 PORTABLE BLUE TOOTH SPEAKER
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: So sad this broke in the first hour of use
customer_reviews.text: We loved this for the hour that it worked... We are on an 18 hour car ride with a 1 year old. We ordered this last week because of all of the great reviews. Tested it when we got it and it seemed perfect. The first hour of our drive we were thrilled with it. The dvd froze and now it is either a blank screen or it goes back to the frozen part and it makes a clicking sound. I have tried several different DVDs and it starts out frozen part way through them all. You can't get to the main menu. We note have my phone balanced in this things headrest case. We are so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth 1 star!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 of these for a 12 hour car ride with the kids. When we unpacked them, I noticed they were very lightweight and felt flimsy. One of them was also missing the remote control. We tried to use the 1 remote for both of them, but the remote was very unresponsive and proved to be worthless. The players worked “ok”. Neither one held a charge so we plugged them into the cigarette lighter in the car. The picture quality was only “ok” and the sound was very bad. Even when plugged into a power source, the players shut off at random times during the movie. I’m so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Softball Mama

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This is a WORTHLESS piece of junk. I played a DVD - played fine. Then I went to play another DVD (brand new; just out of the case) and it would not play. It wasn’t in a format that the player did not support. Then I tried to play the DVD I first played and received “ERR DISC.” Nothing in the manual explained anything that might be going on. It’s in the trash now. The next one I order will be from a company that I recognize. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Weltha J. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Loud clicking sound
customer_reviews.text: 1st time I turned it out it made a very loud clicking sound. Turned it off and out a DVD in it to see if that made a difference but still made very loud clicking sound. It stopped after a minute or so but it seemed like it was going to break. I tried it a few times and even picking it up it started the clicking sound again. The reviews seemed really good so I thought it was promising so maybe I just received a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: KTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Happy Grandsons!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for our grandsons. Downloaded the games and our older grandson loves the games. Younger grandsons likes to use it to watch DVDs.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: It's great for a DVD player
customer_reviews.text: It's great for a DVD player. Serves the purpose of keeping the child occupied on long road trips. The main drawbacks are simply due to it being an older technology - harder to change programming/shows (parent must do it in our case), not a touch screen, etc. Works well in the car even with bumpy roads (and using the car mount). We have to keep it plugged in, but the cord easily reaches the outlet in our sedan. We downloaded the games, but couldn't easily access them from our thumbdrive, so we downplayed this function with our kid (keeping the game controller out of sight).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This product says it’s supposed to have a 5 hr battery life well testing it during a road trip it died after 1 hr. That’s after charging it all night. Then tested again does after an hr. The other issue is the speaker is really terrible you can barely hear anything come out with the volume maxed out. I returned it and purchased the 30IFUN and it works very well and has good sound, picture quality, and so far a 5 hr battery life we watched trolls 4 times before it died. Almost same price!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Moore

customer_reviews.title: Mine was faulty.
customer_reviews.text: Audio jack is faulty. I have tried two sets of head phones. It requires constant re adjustment. Also, you can, but darn if you will remember how to take it out of "subtitle" mode. Annoying. Back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Skip C Walnut Creek CA

customer_reviews.title: works great - impressive quality!
customer_reviews.text: We just got this and tested it out for the past week. This is a gift for our kids from their Grandma. The kids really like watching DVDs on it during traveling and at home. The functionality is easy to figure out, pretty self explanatory. It plugged in easily in our van to stay charged. The battery life hasn't been fully tested but does work without being connected to a power source. I think the quality of the screen is pretty good for the price. I also adjusted the settings to make it up to my standards. Pretty good sound quality too. I'm very pleased with this player and will buy a couple more for each child!
customer_reviews.author: happyrunner

customer_reviews.title: Love this DVD!
customer_reviews.text: **updated with comment below one month later** Small portable device packs a huge sound punch! any portable DVD players I have owned before have always had one problem in common, the volume is so low it is hard to hear over road noise. Well - not this one! Its very loud for such a small unit! I'm amazed. Its very sleek and user friendly. I haven't received the email with the downloadable games yet, but am excited to try that part, too! I would recommend this player for anyone who is shopping for one! A++
customer_reviews.author: kcarp

customer_reviews.title: Nice little player for little ones
customer_reviews.text: Honestly a great little dvd player for short trips or if you are tired of watching the same movie 6x a day with your toddler! The only downfall and why I gave it 4 stars is the volume is not very loud so its a good idea to plan to use with headphones pretty exclusively. It charges quickly and customer service was great when I had an issue. Player is easy to use with a remote to access higher functions but it can be used without the remote too.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Groce

customer_reviews.title: It is very nice. I hope to enjoy it soon. My daughter has fallen in love with it.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t checked the control yet since I need to buy some batteries AAA. The DVD player is intended for my personal use since I have some exercising routines in this type of format, so buying this player it gives me the portability I was looking for and the comfort to bring it to the park where I exercise. My daughter I fall in love with it and is now playing all her lovely Barbie movies in it. I think I must either let her enjoying it for a while, before she claims the right to it, or just buying an additional one. Hopefully, I could have this equipment available soon.
customer_reviews.author: anniamarg

customer_reviews.title: Fun and entertaining for my 3 year old, good battery life!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the quality of the item because it wasn't a brand name I recognized, but took the chance and I'm glad I did! The swivel screen is the handiest feature I could ask for. The controls are simple enough that my 3 year old figured it out within minutes. Battery life with continuous play is about 4 hours. Remote works beautifully. My only concern is that the dvd stops playing and goes to blue screen when the player is tilted vertically. This could be a major problem if you put the player into a headrest mounted holder for viewing in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Joni L. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Was good - but problem with screen less than a year later
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this portable DVD player, but just recently noticed this line running right down the middle of the screen. I thought it was just a dvd glitch, but it has been on every DVD I've tried. While it plays fine, it is annoying to have this line running down the middle after owning it less than a year. I worry it will just get worse over time. The dvd player sits on my desk and doesn't travel or anything (not a cracked screen or anything like that), this line just appeared. Was good, now disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Great for road trips with small kids!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for our Easter weekend road trip! They feel ironically light and not heavy like older DVD players, but we’re still robust enough. Easy for a 6yr and 8yr old to use. Had to go online to download the video games to a thumb drive and then plug it in to play the games. It was easy to download thou once I found the link in someone’s Q&A response above, and there’s over 200 games to choose from. They are nostalgic “old school” 2D games, so nothing fancy like today’s games, but the kids liked them. They don’t come with headphones, we found those elsewhere on Amazon. Very pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: BenchPressBetty

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable DVD player.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this several times camping for personal entertainment. Its loud enough, picture is great, battery seemes to last 5 hours or more. While onmy last camping trip I lost the regular plug for it. I contacted the company and they are going to send me a replacement for free. It would of been nice to use while our power was out to charge on the generator but I then realized I didn't have a regular plug. Impressed with this compnay's quick response and being very helpful to me.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Best for older children
customer_reviews.text: I checked out all the features except for games. I bought four DVD players of different brands and all seemed equal. This one has many of the controls on the side which might be cumbersome for the youngest one but will work for the oldest. I bought purple and my granddaughter will love the color. I am taking my grandchildren across country by air. Hope to occupy them on the trip. Will update on how the player performed on the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for my kids (one for each). This is great for long travels especially my kids get easily bored. This item allows them to have the entertainment they need may it be for playing 80s NES games, watch their favorite movies or listen to their music. Endless ways to get them occupied and the plus side it can be carried anywhere you want! We can have them packed in their backpacks for air flight as well. I am beyond pleased with this purchase and now I can keep my kids settled while we travel everywhere. Added information my kids’ ages are 5yrs old and 7yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Skelley

customer_reviews.title: No games as was advertised
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this for the game, it does not come with instructions to download them, which was frustrating. I had to contact the seller a couple of times before I heard back from them and then they sent a disk with the games. I wish they would just include it im the first place or a sheet with instructions. Otherwise, The DVD function works fine, and after finally getting the games, my son really enjoys them. The volume function with head phones is also on the quiet side and can't be heard if there are other background noise, but we've had it several months now and it is still working well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Travel DVD Player - Happy Child = Happy Ride
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product to aid our holiday travel. The item arrived on time and held up well through many miles and a few accidental drops under the care of our 4 year old. I do wish the product would have come with the headrest holder and a bag. Those are two of the three items I hope to receive next. The third is upfront access to the video game function. There was a note included that this and other items would be available days after purchase. Unfortunately, we purchased the item right before leaving town. We would purchase this item again and are happy to recommend it to those looking for a portable DVD player.
customer_reviews.author: G. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I havent used it much yet, just to make sure it works. Def good quality for the price I paid and seems to work well...and much more solid then my last one which after 6 month wouldnt close all the way and load the disk...let's just hope that doesnt happen with this one. Update: haven't had it long and it ended up having the same issue as my last one and says "open" when it is closed...gonna try and fiddle with it and see if I could fix it I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Portable DVD player with nice perks
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully we’ll get a lot of use out of this new DVD player. We’re particularly excited about the games because they will come in handy during road trips when we don’t have cell reception and our daughter gets tired of watching movies. The game controller is pretty poor quality however our daughter isn’t very rough on equipment so I hope it will last. I played around with it for a while and the only issue I had was trying to turn down the volume while in game mode. I’m sure that I’ll figure out the quirks of the console after a few more uses. Overall, I think this was a great purchase at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: For the Frequent Traveller
customer_reviews.text: If you love your DVDs and you travel often, this is a great little gadget. I usually like to watch what’s not readily available via streaming, ie Shakespeare Plays. If I’m not using my headset, I hook up an external speaker because I like my videos extra loud (to block out City noise). I haven’t yet been successful with connecting to a tv, i’ll try contacting customer service when it’s a less hectic time for me. Overall, I’m happy with my purchase and recommend this for both children and adults..
customer_reviews.author: CC, Brooklyn NY

customer_reviews.title: Great player for the price, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the price! Picture and sound seems good, I use headphones a lot. My music DVDs sound great! Now if I can only figure out what this Copy button on the player is for?!?! Customer support responds very quickly, which is great! Big help when you need it. NES games is a huge plus, I miss the old days playing. Only wish I could purchase a joystick for some of the games for this player. I would recommend this to anybody who wants an affordable and great player!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this, it was to be a replacement item. Wish I had opened this present (gift) to myself earlier. My old player started to work, again, when it saw a newer model had become family, so this DVD stayed on the shelf until yesterday. When I opened the box, it was Christmas morning. Wow! I was surprised! It is not JUST a DVD player. I can use my remote AND play games. It swivels. My old player, plays discs.....that's it. I am so happy with this purchase. Sorry Christmas did not come earlier. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: O.R.

customer_reviews.title: Inacurate size description
customer_reviews.text: I order this and the Apeman 10.5, the Apeman screen and the dvd player as a whole is larger than this, also the screen quality is garbage. It smells like spray paint when you take it out of the package. It looks cheap and it feels cheap. Also there's a note in there that they will give you a card holder for your review. I strongly recommend you keep looking. Take this from a person who didn't take a bribe for a review.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this portable DVD player now for 1.5 years. I must say, I expected it to be of better quality. It's overall confusing to handle, and the most disappointing feature is that the sound level is so low. With some DVD's, I barely can understand things, even though I turn the sound to the highest level possible. I would not recommend this DVD-Player, and would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Boo

customer_reviews.title: What is NOT to love?
customer_reviews.text: Y’all .... seriously what are you waiting for? This is probably one of the greatest buys I’ve made in a while. I bought this because I have a lot of Romanian dvds for children but unfortunately my son could not enjoy them as our DVD player is not region free. And so my hunt began ... I am so glad I found this product. Not only does it come with games, controller and an av tv connector ... it is STURDY and DURABLE. The quality of the image and sound is crisp and HD quality. This mama is one happy camper thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a player that you can use almost anywhere. Great price as well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two for our kids for our vacation. Great for watching in the car. Has a built in battery that stated charged for over 5 hours. Has a remote, car adapter, tv adapter and game controller. Picture and sound were great. Wish they were blu ray, but not a huge deal. Also if you download the game link they have and put it on thumb drive, you get about 180 classic nes games. My older son thought that was awesome, although he said the graphics aren’t as good as his newer games. 😂. Contra and Castlevania were on the drive, so I enjoyed it. If you grew up in the 80’s the games are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Sned

customer_reviews.title: Can’t depend on it
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it works sometimes it doesn’t. For $50 something not worth it. Also the most frustrating thing about is when you use in the car and its flipped over with the button side inside, and you place in the car head seat mount you will always hit other buttons placing it in, which either cancel the play or restarted it to the menu section. So you have to guess where the play button is by hitting the screen twice or so you can initiate the play again. very annoying and defeats the whole point of user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: alwaysachance

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value and the Item DOES WHAT IS SUPPOSED TO!
customer_reviews.text: It does the job! Volume is pretty decent-- do not have to use headphones or external speakers. Controls are easy to use which I think is a plus. We have taken it on trips to watch DVD's while we travel. Plays them all. Battery life is good. Picture is good. Unit is light. I looked hard to find the best one and am confident that I did. Both Wife and I are happy with this choice! I am receiving a promotional item as a reminder to place this review, but this is an honest review. My wife and I are very picky.... if this thing was not good you would be reading complaints instead. OSU Guy
customer_reviews.author: OSU Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great product & Customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality was clear and bright. Sound was perfect. I followed the directions to load games on my labtop and couldn't get them to load on my disk. This was disappointing as I purchased this for my grandson for a 5 hr. weekend trip. I will try on my husbands pc. Also the instructions were sparse for someone who is not tech savy. I have yet to be able to get the free car mount. Customer service contacted me within 24 hrs. of posting. They have resolved the issue with game cd and are sending me the free car mount. Would strongly recommend this product for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works just as it said it would but the video game part was harder to figure out than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is awesome, easy to use, doesn't skip even on road trips but the video game part was harder to figure out than I thought. I thought you would just plug the controller in and start playing, not the case. I got ahold of customer support (very easily) and they let me know I had to buy a flash drive and download the zip file onto my computer and then unzip it to the flash drive. I was a little overwhelmed by this task at first and it took a couple tries but I figured it out. Now it works great! My kids love it and its a great size for taking places, very transportable.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials. Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before deciding on this DVD player and I am very disappointed. The build quality of this DVD player is horrible!! Out of the box there was something loose inside bouncing around. The remote broke when I was trying to open it to insert batteries. The picture quality is good but that’s about it. Sound was not very loud either even turned up all the way. The disc spinning was noisy and made a funny noise too. I think a lot of the reviews are padded because the company will give you a free case for a good review. I’m returning and trying a different company. Hope the new DVD player is better.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: This DVD player was the perfect solution. The headphones made it perfect for working ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I wanted. As an author, I often do research by watching videos of historical significance and for inspiration. When the DVD player went out on my laptop, it was too expensive to repair. This DVD player was the perfect solution. The headphones made it perfect for working at night so as not to disturb my family. It is everything they claimed it to be and more. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Champagne

customer_reviews.title: Great portable DVD player
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player works very well. I haven't downloaded the games yet, but am going to soon. I got the purple player and it is a good purple. I did have one DVD that froze, I rewound it a bit then it worked fine. The DVD did not freeze on my bluray player. There have been no mechanical/electronic problems with the player or remote. I'm thinking of getting one in red. It is a good price too. Be sure to review it here to get a free car headrest holder for it. I recommend this DVD player.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter985

customer_reviews.title: Did not work very long
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these DVD players for my kids. They worked okay for a few months, but then the headphone jack went bad on one, the screen stopped working on the other, and both of them eventually stopped working all together long before they were even a year old. We purchased additional, more comfortable headphones for the kids to use, and never used any of the gaming accessories. Overall, I think this DVD player is overpriced for what it is and how long it lasted. I would not repurchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa G

customer_reviews.title: Happy I Purchased This!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for those cold wintery nights when I wish to lay in bed and watch a DVD. It was very inexpensive, and while I worried about the quality, fears were quickly put aside. This DVD player has excellent sound and picture. It is small enough to fit in a backpack, and it is quiet! None of the DVD spinning sounds. It feels light and the weight tells you it isn't the highest end product, but it is definitely worth the price, and a good investment. For the price of a pizza and soda, it is a great little DVD player!
customer_reviews.author: CCrystals121Top Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a great portable DVD player
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve purchased I tried others and had to return them because the volume was bad or the color was off this DVD player is 5 star all the way! The color is perfect the volume actually adjusts and goes to a level that is heard not just quiet but can be loud. The seller responds quickly to questions as well. I love the remote and I didn’t send in for the holder yet but sure it is good
customer_reviews.author: Khmer Lotus

customer_reviews.title: PICTURE AND SOUND QUALITY BETTER THAN EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: I bought this player for my grandson to catch him up on learning sight words from video lessons. It is actually better than what I expected. The picture and sound quality are good enough for me to use for my own personal viewing. My grandson loves this machine. It keeps his attention and more importantly, keeps him learning. I haven't written many reviews in the past but this product got my attention. Thanks for something I feel is actually worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: KEITH WASHINGTON

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Picture
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with the picture quality on this device. It’s come a long way from when I was young. Impressive picture quality. The speaker is not amazing. You will definitely need to be in a quiet room to hear without headphones. The remote works and is an added bonus for when you’re trying to help your little one in the backseat.
customer_reviews.author: @w

customer_reviews.title: Best portable DVD player by far. Grandmother approved !
customer_reviews.text: We had one of these made by a different company. My loves Mickey Mouse. We play the DVD player every time she's in the car. The one we had would take 15 minutes to get it to except a command to play a certain video. My son-in-law Who is a computer expert reviewed this product and purchased one for their car. He told me about it I purchased one. I'm so glad I did. This product is awesome it actually remembers where the video left off at when the car is turned off. It will go right back to where it was. I'm sold on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Tuttoilmondo

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters for Christmas & they love it! Surprisingly, they share it and the swivel screen makes that easier for them. It’s simple to use; my 3 year old figured it out really quick. It’s great to take in the car too! The packaging was great. It’s super protected in several layers. I wish it would have came with a carry case but it doesn’t. I can (and will) be buying one separately! Great product. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Burdette

customer_reviews.title: Games are not included
customer_reviews.text: Excited for this, as I bought it for a trip across the country for my daughter. I would have given it 5 stars I'd it was explicitly explained that to get the games, there would have to be a download process onto a zip drive via a PC. The description alluded to the fact that it would come with the games, and the user manual just says to use the remote "to choose the game interface" . . . . . Very misleading. As a DVD player, it is what I expected and am excited, as my daughter is. Hopefully it will keep it up with our trip!
customer_reviews.author: Vera Nixon

customer_reviews.title: and my children were devastated the new SUV did not have a dvd player like the minivan did
customer_reviews.text: I recently traded in our minivan for a new SUV, and my children were devastated the new SUV did not have a dvd player like the minivan did. I scoured the internet looking for the perfect one, reading review after review on every website. I came across this COOAU brand one, and was very satisfied with all that people had to say. I also really appreciated that it had a resume feature, as that is very important when constantly getting in and out of the car. It arrived quickly, packaged nicely and the picture quality is better than my mac computer. It is sturdy and easy to use. All in all we are very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julee T.

customer_reviews.title: No game link
customer_reviews.text: Never received the game link for the game controller. This was a gift for my granddaughter and she is disappointed she can't play the games
customer_reviews.author: Lisa m Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Great value, screen definition and size and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a "jewel".....we took our 6 year old granddaughter to Canada (National Parks - free pass in 2017) and toured their Provincial Parks.....it was a long trip, but she watched movies....on the back of the seat but she preferred watching them with this sitting on her lap. Price was right, quality was good and we got the money back in "spades" via entertainment for her.....didn't hear much of the "Are we there yet?".
customer_reviews.author: Clark S

customer_reviews.title: the remote don't work if the screen is turned backwards
customer_reviews.text: The likes is the definit amazing picture quality it has it is absolutely amazing, I for one don't mind that it don't work with all formats, It works for the one thing i love the most the secret life of the american teenager... "On my flash drive" after i figured out how to work with the sound the sound quality is now amazing, I don't have many dislikes about it... I have literally no problem with this thing. It is AWESOME I only rated the remote control at 4 because it doesn't work with the screen turned, Other wise i'd give it a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice to have for the car/kids!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought TWO of these DVD players and connected them together with a 3.5mm AV cable (purchased separately). These are great for the kids for long car rides! Battery life is good, lasts well over 4 hours. The packaging is excellent, they are packaged very nicely! The included remote control is nice to have for in the car as well! Haven't used the game remote yet, just because we mainly bought these to play movies. It comes with both Car and Wall chargers, which is great! Overall, great quality and value, a must have for the kids and car rides!
customer_reviews.author: bmhkch

customer_reviews.title: 6 months, low volume use, and we had to return
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 8 year old son. We only use the DVD player for long road trips and for Airport Traveling as opposed to high volume daily use. The receptacle to plug in headphones was shot after 6 months and we had to return it. Battery Life, Picture Quality, and Sound was good. The swivel head is awesome as you can you use it on the back of your head rest, use it on your lab, etc. The On/Off button is on the side and is hard to find because it isn't with the other buttons and hard to turn off in the dark. I purchased a warranty through Square Trade, so let's see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: GIzmo

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this DVD player
customer_reviews.text: So I have all these DVDs. It's nutty to me that as consumers we are no longer able to own movies, but must rather subscribe to monthly services that may or may not have the movies you want. So having a portable DVD player to watch my own movies is awesome. It's a tiny bit bulky at 1.75" thick, and therefore not necessary great to take on a plane when trying to go light, but for camping or other travels this will be handy. It works great and I consider this a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Portable DVD Player!
customer_reviews.text: The high reviews this product has received from other buyers are right on the money. This is a wonderful portable DVD player! Good sound, clear picture and sold at an awesome price. I was impressed that this player also came with a remote control, one game controller and a car charging unit. And although this isn't necessarily "product" related, I'm blown away at how securely this was packaged inside the manufacturers box. I'm extremely pleased with this purchase and would definitely buy from this seller again. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Ldess

customer_reviews.title: Good player for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product for the price. I was looking for something non expensive for the grands when they are with me. I did not need a incar system. They ended up using it in the house too. We went to a hotel plunged in the connectors to the tv and watched our own shows. Cons the volume is low, no Bluetooth capability, when plugged into a tv the volume is controlled by the player therefore there is an eco. But it was good for what I need occasion use and price.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Product and Did Not Charge
customer_reviews.text: I chose this DVD player because of the option to plug into a power bank... alas, the player would noteven charge up at all. I used all of the items that came with it... so disappointed as I really liked the feature of being able to set up to a portable charging bank Product felt flimsy like a toy cell phone...
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Hannold

customer_reviews.title: Cooau - Wicked Awesome For All Ages
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kid for Christmas. He absolutely loves your Cooau Portable DVD Player that swivels. He spent all Christmas Day using this DVD player. He said mama this is "classy and wicked cool DVD player for a kid". The screen size is good too. Got this in BLUE, a hit for my kiddo. This is our first time buying this brand. We love it & what an amazing product! Thanks Cooau for adding extra SMILES on kid's face all Christmas Day! My kid gives you a "Perfect 10"! Thanks Cooau, a happy kid & Mom!
customer_reviews.author: 6XPats

customer_reviews.title: Still works after a year!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this DVD player for a year now, and it still works perfectly. My little one loves the games it comes with and it still holds its charge to this day. I would highly recommend this DVD player.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: HERE'S THE TRUTH - Reviews are same as bought
customer_reviews.text: When you receive your DVD player, there's a card included in several different languages stating to leave a review about your positive experience, then email them the review, and they'll send you a free case. I left a positive review for that reason. It broke the next day. I bought another DVD player from Amazon (Igeek) - They're doing the same thing. I buy everything based on reviews. This is very discouraging. How many people are coming back and updating once it breaks?? I did not feel comfortable exchanging. I'm pretty confident these DVD players are junk.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 year old daughter bought this with her own money. She couldn't be happier with it. Has played DVDs without a problem. Volume without additional speakers is fine for what you would expect from a portable device like this. Downloading the games was a bit tricky, but it was our issue and we got it figured out. Found out not to use a USB stick bigger than 32 GB. Overall, she's happy with her purchase so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a year and a half
customer_reviews.text: I bought this January of 2018. I got rid of the TV in my house and still wanted to watch my workout DVDs. It worked great for the time that it was operational. Recently it ran out of battery life and will not charge. The screen won't turn on even after charging for a day. Once I got it to turn on and started to play but then it went black again. I'm really disappointed that it didn't last longer. I really was hoping this would be a good product from all the good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: C. Perillo

customer_reviews.title: Very poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: So I have no idea why my first review wasn’t taken. But the sound quality on this is very poor. My children couldn’t even hear it over the road noise, or the sound of the crickets in the cabin. We got it for a 12 hour road trip and it was pretty much useless because they had to watch it with basically no sound, which was disappointing !
customer_reviews.author: jessishay

customer_reviews.title: More than decent video player.
customer_reviews.text: Got this video player for my daughter. She really really likes it. Shes watching on it right now. I believe this was a great choice for her. The color is way cool, the screen is nice, the functions are easy peazy to handle, plus with the extras you cannot go wrong purchasing one of these. Comes with everything it says it does. Plus the link for the games.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Just bought my second one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in red two years ago for my daughter.... she loves it! I just bought her a second one because our dog decided to destroy the red one. I bought her second one in purple. The price is very reasonable, the quality is excellent. She takes it everywhere with her. It’s great for long drives too! ☺️
customer_reviews.author: nathalie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Just opened mine and played with it for a while to see how easy it is to use....pretty simple and the video quality is great....screen size is perfect for a toddler. We use an iPad right now for intermittent viewing, so this is very comparable in size. It extremely light weight as well, which you wouldn’t expect when seeing the device. I foresee this being put to good use when we travel.
customer_reviews.author: Cheungs & Wongs

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Received my order an was impressed by the packaging along with all the attachments. We previously owned a different portable player which broke an had to by a car charger separate, but this player came with one along with remote game controller ( which they send you free down loads for great games to play) The picture quality is amazing an you can feel the durability of the product! The buttons are are firm to the touch an don’t stick like the previous player. The buttons are easy to read/ use for my 5 year old he already has it figured out. Would highly recommend this brand of portable DVD player.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Price

customer_reviews.title: Broken after one month of use
customer_reviews.text: After one month of use once per day, the fast forward button stuck and videos would not play at regular speed. After considerable effort to get it unstuck, the picture and audio were choppy and going in and out. I got this based on the number of stars it had been rated - i should have gotten a brand i knew.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon McAnne

customer_reviews.title: I was satisfied with the product and it did the job which ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the kids for a bit of entertainment and resolve a minor problem, we didn't have power for few months since hurricane Maria in PR. It charges fast and it last up to 5 hrs, my kids would watch sometime up to 3 movies. I was satisfied with the product and it did the job which was to take the kids off me for a few hours while I mess with the other non power situations of the house. Thankfully we already have power.
customer_reviews.author: Shannai

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good at playing DVDs - does not skip when shaken. The remote is an infrared type, so it must be aimed right to work. Works pretty well with headphones, but the volume control is by button or remote only. The games did not work out of the box. I'll need to email customer support to get it to work. This came with a great cigarette lighter charger and a wall charger, as well as a 3.5mm to RCA cable jack, which is pretty cool. All-in-all worth the price, but not exactly a high-end device.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Entertainment
customer_reviews.text: We love being able to add videos to an SD card or USB drive for hours of entertainment without changing dvds, great for long car rides. The kids also have fun playing some classic 8-bit games. The menu and switching between sources (dvd/video files/games) could be a little more smooth...but it works and is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: amazonjunkee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The picture and audio of this portable DVD player are excellent. Long battery life after charging. Very intuitive (easy) to operate. Would buy again. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updated: won't play DVDs for us.
customer_reviews.text: Update: 2 of my 3 DVD players won't actually play DVDs. We got them to play the little video games, but when you put in a DVD they make a really loud rattling sound and won't play anything. I am really disappointed because we bought these for traveling. I ordered 3 of these for my kids for Christmas this year. They seem to be good quality and they have good picture and sound (I charged them all to make sure they work). As for battery life, I cannot say yet but I will update my review if there is an issue. They are lightweight, but that isn't really a bad thing. They will be perfect for traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my daughter so she hasn't used it yet but i did plug it up & watch a movie on it & it worked great. Picture quality good, sound level great, the remote is very handy, i can't wait to find out what games she can play on it. Very happy with this purchase & i can't wait for her to use it on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate volume
customer_reviews.text: I just received this DVD player and was excited to get it. However, the volume isn’t nearly loud enough. I bought it to use while exercising with our Bowflex. You just can’t hear it. My husband set it up to show subtitles, and that’s helpful, but it sure would be nice if I could hear it too. We plan to see if we can strap it into the Bowflex somehow so I can use earphones with it. Just really wish the volume was better.
customer_reviews.author: Lori C.

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best
customer_reviews.text: First, the device gets really warm when being used, so it's not a great lap device. Also, I have had hell getting it to play home movies and what-not that people send me on thumb drives; so far, it only wants to work seamlessly with actual DVD discs.
customer_reviews.author: Josh H. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but doesn’t work great.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and comes with a lot of accessories but it glitches out randomly. The screen quality is ok but it is very angle sensitive; to far forward or back the screen is not visible. And the volume is not that loud. Maybe I’m just deaf. I fully charged it before use and the first time I used it 20 min it froze and started making horrid noises. Then the wording and lip sync become off the next use. Spend the extra money and get a brand name DVD player. I had high hopes for this product but it was a con.
customer_reviews.author: brian hurley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I like the color. It is great for a child. A little disappointed as it is for myself and the picture is a but deceiving as I thought it was a but more sleek. It's more bulky and like a child's toy. The screen reminds me of an old TV. Not blurry but definitely not great resolution. I give it 3 stars because it isnt terrible but I'll definitely purchase a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my boys! One came damaged but was quickly replaced by customer service! They've lasted a lot longer than any other DVD player we've bought.. The chargers recently fell apart, but customer service was more than willing to send me new chargers for free!
customer_reviews.author: Mermom1316

customer_reviews.title: Great player for my Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I just received this DVD player. Plugged it in and it works fine. Picture quality is very good. Volume is somewhat quiet although I know my Granddaughter will be using headphones so that will not matter. Love the purple color. Can't wait to download the games so she can play them. Came with everything needed to take it on trips. Love the remote control ability as well, very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: G. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these for my 3 children for Christmas. They are a great value and very good quality. In fact, these are much higher quality than any portable DVD players I have seen at stores for more money. Also, the accessories that are included are a nice bonus. The file of games was emailed to me after purchase, easily downloaded onto a flash drive and used on the DVD players. The games will not play on my computer, but work perfectly well on the DVD player. They are classic NES games. My boys have enjoyed playing them and it's nice to mix up what they can do on the DVD player for long car rides.
customer_reviews.author: Amber D.

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 4 different DVD players in the past two years because of my 2 year old. This is the worst! While the other times it was her that broke them this one is simply falling apart already. By that I mean the screen is coming of it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Garcia Mosqueda

customer_reviews.title: Ollie loves it...
customer_reviews.text: Don't laugh, but, our Springer Spaniel, Oliver loves his new DVD player. He will sit and watch movies for hours and this unit is just perfect for him. The rotating scree makes it possible to move the controls away from his paws and that is perfect. Thank you for giving the family tv/dvd back to us.
customer_reviews.author: pat g.

customer_reviews.title: Great DVD for region free viewing
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a few weeks now and it works wonderful. Im addicted to old Brit Coms that you can only get region 2 so this machine is a God send. I ahoukd have gotten a region free device before but im so happy i have now and very happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sean C

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Just love my portable DVD player. Esp. the purple color. Mostly though the screen display is far better than another I have used. And the ease of use is great. Plus the swivel screen is just the best. When I want to change position or show my friends something. You wont be disappointed. Everything about this Dvd player is far better than expected. Cant find anything wrong with it. It is constructed well to. enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Carla Eisenhauer

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising on Unit Specifications & Capabilities
customer_reviews.text: This is deceptive advertising! No one gives a damn about the size of the display case -Only the screen size! This is nowhere near 11.5 and not even 9.5 inches either -it more like 8.90 inches. The only saving grace and the reason to keep it is maybe because the picture quality seems to be quite good and you may as well forget the USB and the SD card hookup because of the parameter limitations and requirements to get those to work pretty just makes this a lame duck and garden variety DVD player only.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the COOAU Portable DVD Player 11.5" with Game Joystick for my 6 year old son. The video game frequently freezes and stops in the middle of game play. Recently the controller (joystick) stopped working so now we are completely unable to use the video game system, as we only had one controller/joystick. I am very disappointed in the quality of this product, as it did not last very long.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Survives the roughness of toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is the second COOAU dvd player we have bought for our family (first one for my daughter, now this one for my son). The size is great and large enough. I am thoroughly impressed with this brand. These DVD players have withstood everything a toddler can do to them! They have been dropped multiple times and continue to work!! They have survived the roughness a toddler can do to them. I would highly recommend this product for young children.
customer_reviews.author: StaceyMike

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: We bought this DVD player for a trip. We charged it up and took off on the trip. The battery died after watching movies just fine. When we plugged the unit into the car power and tried to watch a movie at the same time, all we got was a blinking screen. We tried it again using a plug in at home, same result. It takes a long time to charge so the trip was a long one since movies couldn’t be watched the entire time. I have emailed and left customer feedback with the company but have received no response. Very disappointed in the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely terrible!! It makes a loud rattling noise, and my daughter's broke within the first 3 hours of use. Of course I'm outside the return window, so nothing to be done. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: sms

customer_reviews.title: The picture is nice, and we like the slightly larger screen since ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. The volume is louder than our old dvd player, so my kids can listen to it with or without earphones and still hear the movies. The picture is nice, and we like the slightly larger screen since our two kids share. My son only complained that some of his movies automatically started with closed captioning, and he had to go turn it off every time he started another movie. Although that may be a default setting we need to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My kids like this DVD player. The battery seems to stay charged for quite awhile which is nice on long car rides. It is a little smaller than I thought though. The biggest downfall is the game titles are not in English and the cord on the game controller has already started to come off.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: This is a very well-made DVD player and the price is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of money spent this is a very nice DVD player my granddaughter is going to love it! It came a little bit later than originally said but that's due to extenuating circumstances with this virus. I am very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jules Lasater

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Watch dvd's on TV or use as a stand-alone unit. Plays my cd's load, good volume control. It also has tons of really fun games, with good graphics that are easy to plug and play, after a simple USB download. Nice looking unit, for an adult, child or teenager. This portable video player would be a wonderful gift, it is packaged so beautifully and comes with lots of accessories (wall charger, car charger, remote, game controller, sturdy box with a handle, and Av in/out cords). Instructions are easy to follow and buttons on unit are good sized for easy function. Swivel feature is an added plus!
customer_reviews.author: D.R. Barteau

product_meta.title: COOAU 11” Portable DVD Player, Support Power Bank Charging, Last Memory Function, Region Free, SD/USB/AV-Out Port with 9" HD Swivel Screen, Purple
feature_bullets: 🌈EYESIGHT PROTECTIVE SCREEN — 9” Brightness enhanced HD screen with 270 degrees swivel angle, COOAU CU-902 portable DVD player enables you to enjoy your favorite movies in a comfortable orientation.

🌈BETTER BATTERY PERFORMANCE — The built-in rechargeable 2500mAh lithium-ion battery supports 5 hours movie play. It also comes with an AC adapter and a car charger, charge up your DVD player at anywhere.
🌈 ADVANCED POWER BANK CHARGING DESIGN — CU-902 portable DVD player adopts the micro USB charging port. It will be more convenient when you are on trip or outside for your happy family time.

🌈PROFESSIONAL AUDIO SYSTEM — The built-in stereo speakers of this portable DVD player would take you to an audio carnival. Also, the player’s 3.5mm port allows it to connect with a headphone or a speaker.

🌈MULTIPLE FORMATS SUPPORTED — The player’s REGION FREE feature ensures it read discs from different DVD regions, it supports most DVD formats except blu-ray. The player will also play movies from USB and SD card.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,319 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
